index.title: Build
index.description: Start building on ZetaChain, the only decentralized blockchain and smart contract platform built for omnichain interoperability.

overview.title: ZetaChain Overview
overview.description: ZetaChain is a blockchain for universal omnichain apps that span across any blockchain, from Ethereum and Cosmos to Bitcoin and beyond.

apps.title: Building Universal Apps
apps.description: A universal app is an EVM-compatible smart contract deployed on ZetaChain's universal EVM.

transactions.title: Types of Transactions
transactions.description: ZetaChain supports multiple types of transactions, including cross-chain transactions, token transfers, and more.
